DocLocalization.Name: Représentation de la forme du produit

DocAttribute.Name: ShapeOfProduct
HasShapeAspects
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the shape aspect that represents part of the shape or its feature distinctively.

DocWhereRule.Name: OnlyShapeModel
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Only representations of type _IfcShapeModel_, i.e. either _IfcShapeRepresentation_ or _IfcTopologyRepresentation_ should be used to represent a product through the _IfcProductDefinitionShape_.__
